08.headline: Interop Protocols
08.summary: Modularizing the stack: The most interesting development with these designs is the separation between the transport and verification layers.

08.headline: Chainge
08.summary: DAO proposal passed with 95% approval rate. Securing a $13M USD capital injection. Adding into circulation 50 million XCHNG from the investment allocation. Guaranteeing $1 million USD in Q2 profit.

08.headline: Wormhole
08.summary: Building MultiGov by teaming up with tallyxyz and scopelift. MultiGov is a multichain governance system that will soon be available to DAOs on Solana, Ethereum, and EVMs L2s.

09.headline: Picasso
09.summary: Partners with redactedCartel to bring Pirex ETH into Cosmos.

09.headline: Polyhedra
09.summary: Partners with bounce_bit enabling interop between bounceBit and other networks including Bitcoin and Ethereum.

09.headline: Flare
09.summary: RainProtocol - intents like DEX coming to Flare. Open-source desktop app lets you write, deploy, and manage perp token trading strategies written in Rainlang on any EVM network.

10.headline: Jolt
10.summary: New approach to zkVM design. 6X better than RISC Zero and 2X than SP1.

15.headline: Across and Uniswap
15.summary: Propose cross-chain intent standard. With the standard for cross-chain intents, users on Across, UniswapX, or other intents-based systems can sign a cross-chain order that follows one standard.

15.headline: Picasso
15.summary: Picasso Network Extends IBC Protocol to Bridge Solana and Cosmos.

15.headline: Axelar
15.summary: Gamified Web3 marketplace powered by ESE interchaintokens.

17.headline: Astria
17.summary: Building Sequencing layer for permissionless rollups.

17.headline: Scroll
17.summary: Upgrade to Bernoulli has added optimizations like EIP-4844 support, SHA-256 precompile.

17.headline: Polyhedra
17.summary: Partners with Google Cloud to bring ZK proofs to developers.
